posts.post_content:
I have a nice looking T204 Ramly HOFer Eddie Collins in an SGC 40 holder for sale. $1,100 or best offer. Postpaid and delivered, Check or Money Order, NO paypal please. 

SGC has only graded four Eddie Collins T204 cards higher than 40, tougher condition sensitive card.

Scans are not the best, taken with my cheap office copier/fax/scanner.

Scott
